overview: Based on a true story This is the story of Jay and Simone. A couple like any other, that fall in love and get married despite the many signs that point to a rocky marriage. They will have to overcome a lot of transgressions and interference from their family and friends. With no good example of how a healthy marriage works they will have to learn how to love, respect, and honor one another like never before. That is, if they want to save their marriage.
title: No Surrender 2013
